sources.description:
Shock-sock suspense In this murder mystery! A womanâ€™s brother is killed in a freak accident, or so she believes. Fortunately for her, an American journalist is more suspicious and so begins roaming the London streets in search of the killer.

Original title: Lady in the Fog (1952) AKA: Scotland Yard Inspector

Directors: Sam Newfield, Pat Jackson
Writers: Orville H. Hampton, Lester Powell
Stars: Cesar Romero, Lois Maxwell, Bernadette O'Farrell, Geoffrey Keen
Genre: Colorized classics, Mystery

00:00 Full Movie
02:34 A love story unfolds during a sailing race, leading to an accident and a lunch invitation.
06:53 A man attends a party and becomes infatuated with a woman named Ines de Montalban.
15:31 A man travels to meet a woman in Pyla, but she is not there.
23:28 A conversation between two individuals discussing friendship and a potential business deal.
37:35 Inspector Fabre questions Mr. Winemaker about Lucien Bonnet's murder at 56 rue Pigalle.
40:04 A man named Vigneron is suspected of killing his valet and is interrogated by a judge.
54:11 A man named Ricardo de Montalban testifies about lending 1,100,000 francs to the accused, Vigneron.
1:03:29 Ines de Montalban, the mistress of Jean Vigneron, comes forward as a witness and reveals their relationship to the court.
1:04:52 A man named Lucien Bonnet was blackmailing someone with incriminating photographs, but was killed by the person he was blackmailing.
1:11:59 A couple discusses the presence of someone lurking around their house armed to the teeth.
1:20:37 A couple discusses their troubled relationship and the possibility of one of them dying.
